measured_by: Freedom-of-Choice rating scale (slider from “completely influenced” to “completely free”)
justification: “Following the response, participants were required to give a rating of how much their response choice was influenced by the dot-motion… A scale was presented … One end of the scale indicated absolute independence … while the other indicated complete dependence.”

measured_by: Percentage of stimulus-congruent vs. incongruent responses on Detach trials
justification: “We could measure… the extent to which participants successfully ignored stimulus information (by quantifying the objective statistical relation between stimuli and response).”
